item.description:
Restaurant week is April 15th thru 20th.  We have selected Thursday April 19th at 6:30 to meetup for a terrific dining experience.  But with so many restaurants patrticipating, all at the same price of $32 for a three course dinner including appetizer, entree and dessert, we just couldn't decide where to go.  So we've set up a poll on the Dining Out Group's home page.  If you'd like to join us go to menu bar near the top of our page and click on the word 'More', then click on 'Poll', you will see 'Where will we go...' in blue.  Click on that and you will see a list of 12 restaurants to choose from.  Pick the one you would like to try and click on the name.  It's that simple.  We will tally the votes and let you know the winner on April 7th.  It's a great deal and should be a lot of fun. 

See you at Restaurant Week,

Chris Spence

group.name: The New Haven Area Dining Out Group

item.name: Restaurant Week Meetup
